docs.text: TaraxaMkDocs Welcome! For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. Add Pages add .md files in docs edit mkdocs.yml as below site_name: MkLorum nav: - Home: index.md - About: about.md
docs.title: Home

docs.title: Add Pages

docs.text: How to deploy mkdocs to github Doing step by step create repository(such as mkdocs_test) on github https://github.com/cofepy/mkdocs_test clone the repository to local folder git clone https://github.com/cofepy/mkdocs_test cd mkdocs_test in the local folder, create a mkdocs project named "TaraxamMkdocs" pip install mkdocs pip install mkdocs-material mkdocs new TaraxaMkdocs 4. add some .md files in subfolder "docs" mkdocs_test - docs about.md index.md - site mkdocs.yml README.md if you want add a navbar, edit "mkdocs.yml" add below nav: - Home: index.md - About: about.md if you want add a theme, edit "mkdocs.yml" add below theme: name: 'material' (please"pip install mkdocs-material" first) 5. push the project to github git add . git commit -m "init" git push 6. deploy the project mkdocs gh-deploy --clean you can see below info INFO - Cleaning site directory INFO - Building documentation to directory: /Users/bitcocohe/Github/python_app/mkdocs_test/site INFO - Copying '/Users/bitcocohe/Github/python_app/mkdocs_test/site' to 'gh-pages' branch and pushing to GitHub. INFO - Your documentation should shortly be available at: https://cofepy.github.io/mkdocs_test/ 7. see the pages on github https://cofepy.github.io/mkdocs_test/ reference links install https://mkdocs.readthedocs.io/en/0.15.3/ https://www.mkdocs.org/ config https://romandc.com/techtalk-mkdocs/ https://www.mkdocs.org/user-guide/configuration/ theme https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/ deploy https://www.mkdocs.org/#deploying
docs.title: Deploy to github
How to deploy mkdocs to github

docs.text: create repository(such as mkdocs_test) on github https://github.com/cofepy/mkdocs_test clone the repository to local folder git clone https://github.com/cofepy/mkdocs_test cd mkdocs_test in the local folder, create a mkdocs project named "TaraxamMkdocs" pip install mkdocs pip install mkdocs-material mkdocs new TaraxaMkdocs 4. add some .md files in subfolder "docs" mkdocs_test - docs about.md index.md - site mkdocs.yml README.md if you want add a navbar, edit "mkdocs.yml" add below nav: - Home: index.md - About: about.md if you want add a theme, edit "mkdocs.yml" add below theme: name: 'material' (please"pip install mkdocs-material" first) 5. push the project to github git add . git commit -m "init" git push 6. deploy the project mkdocs gh-deploy --clean you can see below info INFO - Cleaning site directory INFO - Building documentation to directory: /Users/bitcocohe/Github/python_app/mkdocs_test/site INFO - Copying '/Users/bitcocohe/Github/python_app/mkdocs_test/site' to 'gh-pages' branch and pushing to GitHub. INFO - Your documentation should shortly be available at: https://cofepy.github.io/mkdocs_test/ 7. see the pages on github https://cofepy.github.io/mkdocs_test/
docs.title: Doing step by step
